title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 228 - SURFACE COATING PROCESSES, COMMERCIAL AND INDUSTRIAL ADHESIVES, SEALANTS AND PRIMERS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 228 - SURFACE COATING PROCESSES, COMMERCIAL AND INDUSTRIAL ADHESIVES, SEALANTS AND PRIMERS
State Regulations

Subpart 228-1 - SURFACE COATING PROCESSES (§ 228-1.1 to 228-1.6)

Subpart 228-2 - COMMERCIAL AND INDUSTRIAL ADHESIVES, SEALANTS AND PRIMERS (§ 228-2.1 to 228-2.7)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 228

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§3-0301, 19-0301, 19- 0303

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
